Welcome Airbraker to the year 2015, the year of hoverboards* and self healing software. Ok, we have hoveboards and but we are still waiting for self healing software.


In late 2014 we completed a migration and consolidation for our Exceptional error tracking users to Airbrake.io. We’ve relaunched Exceptional.io under a consildated brand with a mission to go build tools to help you build better products.


Thank you and Happy New Year!
The Exceptional team.

New! Airbrake Now Fits In Your Pocket - iOS Edition

Hot on the heals the Airbrake Android App launched in Auguest. We are happy to announce the launch of our iPhone app, grab it from the App Store.


New Docs Site

We’ve recently updated our read APIs and have bumped the version to V3 and V4. For viewing and getting a finer control over Airbrake. View the docs at https://airbrake.io/docs.

New IP & SPDY support

In November we’ve updated our dedicated IP for sending and acessing Airbrake. If your using Airbrake in a limited network enviroment, please add `http://104.130.92.120/` to your whitelist. Airbrake is now support SPDY, for extra fast Exception capturing.

New onboarding app.

We’ve recently improved our in-app onboarding to make it easier to configure muliple projects for up to 14 programming lanauges and frameworks.

Airbrake Hosted

If you have strict data securtiy for your applicaiotn or specific performance or scaling needs we are able to offer. For more information on the product please mail hosted@airbrake.io.
